price: ពួកគេនឹងស្រែកថ្ងូរយ៉ាងខ្លាំងនៅក្នុងឋាននរកនោះ ហើយ ពួកគេនៅក្នុងនោះគឺមិនឮអ្វីឡើយ។
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
